description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Edinburgh and its neighbourhood in the days of our grandfathers. A series of (eighty) illustrations [drawn by T. H. Shepherd]. ... with historical and descriptive sketches" Author: GOWANS, James - Sir Contributor: SHEPHERD, Thomas Hosmer. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10369.h.14." Page: 17 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1886 Publisher: J. C. Nimmo Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001478218 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
